title: A maske presented at Ludlow Castle, 1634 on Michaelmasse night, before the Right Honorable, Iohn Earle of Bridgewater, Vicount Brackly, Lord Pr√¶sident of Wales, and one of His Maiesties most honorable Privie Counsell.
